description:
Pluto Batou is the captain of the 2nd Division of the http://anidb.net/ch16863 [Harusame] pirates. He is known as the best swordsman in Harusame with the "The Star Sword King" title. He was said to be able to rival http://anidb.net/ch8702 [Kamui] with a sword in his hand.
He possess an eye that can see through his opponent`s mind, intention, movement, and even past, and is able to slice off buildings and cleave the ground into half easily with his sword.
Source: Gintama Wiki, edited.
name: Pluto Batou
